director.name: 彼得·凯克勒维科 Peter Keglevic

introduction: A great love surrounded by eternally equal criminal power. 1964. After decades, Josef returns back to his hometown to look for his childhood love. Is she still alive? Will she recognize him? Can everything become the same as it once was? The poetry of a life love clouded by poisonous political mood which is fueled by a mystery murder series. And the perpetrators are always the same- from generation to generation.
